def read_list():
    return [int(i) for i in input().split()]
def new_list(n):
    return [0 for i in range(n)]
def new_matrix(n, m=0):
    return [[0 for i in range(m)] for i in range(n)]


d, l, v1, v2 = read_list()

t = l / (v1+v2)

t -= d / (v1+v2)

print(t)
a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())

print("%.10f" % max(0, (b- a) / (c + d)))
d, l, v1, v2 = [int(s) for s in input().split()]
print((l - d)/(v1+v2))
def main():
    d, l, a, b = map(int, input().split())
    l -= d
    ans = l / (a + b)
    print(ans)
    
main()

t = (v1 * (L - d))/(v1 * (v2 + v1))
